title: Booming or breaking? The truth about Russia’s war economy
description: For months after Vladimir Putin’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine, Western leaders predicted Russia’s economy was on the brink of collapse under sanctions – and yet it didn’t. title: Oil prices settle up 1% on bets Fed will cut US rates and doubts about Ukraine peace
description:
A drone view of a pump jack and drilling rig south of Midland, Texas, U.S.
